qas.question: What institute provides education in art, design, and media?
What institute promotes awareness of native culture?

answers.text: Viljandi Culture Academy of University of Tartu

qas.question: What parts of native culture does the Viljandi Culture Academy highlight?

answers.text: native construction, native blacksmithing, native textile design

qas.question: How many Estonian museums existed in 2010?

context: <a0_0>The Estonian Academy of Arts<a0_0/> (Estonian: Eesti Kunstiakadeemia, EKA) is providing higher education in art, design, architecture, media, art history and conservation while <a1_0>Viljandi Culture Academy of University of Tartu<a1_0/> has an approach to popularise native culture through such curricula as <a2_0>native construction, native blacksmithing, native textile design<a2_0/>, traditional handicraft and traditional music, but also jazz and church music. In 2010, there were <a3_0>245<a3_0/> museums in Estonia whose combined collections contain more than 10 million objects.
